title: Basiyu
author: Basiyu
content: There is a news i read from(the street journal) that ELON MUSK and his company is about to enter the final stage of making a robot wives.Â  Â  Â  Â And that the supply of these robot wives are expected to roll out on september 2023,it also expected to get to africa by november 2023.Â  So my question now is,how are these robot wives going to affect or change humans generation,is it in a good way or bad way.

comments.author: Minhxx
comments.body: There seems to be a mistake here Elon musk always thinks that AI is a disaster. Being able to replace humans, I don't believe he invests too much in AI projects.Elon musk shit memecoin!!!!!

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I did hear about this and do not think it will really happen. Not so fast like Elon Musk says so. But I did read this and it is very interesting for me. Brain implants are a real thing and his company Neuralink has got fda approval for human studies.https://www.reuters.com/science/elon-musks-neuralink-gets-us-fda-approval-human-clinical-study-brain-implants-2023-05-25/
